content.text: 2 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles beer
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "2 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles beer" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "275 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "135 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Place roast in a large roasting pan and scatter chopped onions over.
2) In a large bowl, combine Worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, garlic powder, salt and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "Worcestershire sauce"@28:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "liquid smoke"@50:62 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "garlic powder"@64:77 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "salt"@79:83 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "pepper"@88:94 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Pour in beer, stir and add to roasting pan.
4) Add water to the top of beef.
5) Cover and cook in oven at 275 degrees F (135 degrees C) for 4 to 5 hours.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Cover"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "cook"@13:17 / AC
		:loc ( tool-5-0 "oven"@21:25 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-5-0 "275 degrees F"@29:42 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-5-1 "135 degrees C"@44:57 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "4 to 5 hours"@63:75 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 6) When meat is cooked, shred meat with 2 forks, add barbecue sauce and mix well.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "shred"@24:29 / AC
		:ppt ( "meat"@30:34 / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-6-0 "2 forks"@40:47 / TOOL )
		:when ( cond-6-0 "When meat is cooked"@3:22 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "add"@49:52 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "barbecue sauce"@53:67 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-2 "mix"@72:75 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
